LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] Manhattan-bound trains run express from 59 St, Brooklyn to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr</b></font>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 2 - 5<br><br></font>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to </i>53 St and 45 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N] <i>local</i> or <br>Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr <br>and transfer to a <i>local</i> Coney Island-bound [D] [N] or Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service<i> from</i> these stations, take the [D] [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [R].<br><b><br>
